name: Your Typical Space Shooter
description:
Just your typical space shooter! (EXCEPT ITS NOT YOUR TYPICAL SPACE SHOOTER F*CK YOU)

*SUBMITTED TO GRANDMA'S JAM*

Theme: COMBINE

How it is interpreted: I've combined the flapping mechanics from Flappy Bird and the shooter and enemy mechanics from space shooter to create this game!

Controls: Jump: W, SPACE; Shoot: Left mouse button

It is, indeed, a space shooter, BUT, it's father is Flappy Bird, who has given his son the ability to flap mid-air.

Also, it is one of my first games, so it is bound to be trash!
